column4: hi. I want to share with windows, but when I use "sudomount//172.16.73.88/kelsenshare/media/sharename/-ousername=xk,password=kaikai,dmask=777,fmask=777", i can't mount windows share file? why?
sudo mount smb:/192.168.1.100/TangHui的备份 /mnt/win -o username=user,password=123,file_mode=777,dir_mode=777
above can't work property.
sorry...I am...
what kind of error message do you get?
it got the below error message:
htang@ubuntu:~$ sudo mount //192.168.1.100/TangHui的备份 /mnt/win -o username=user,password=123,file_mode=777,dir_mode=777
WARNING: 'file_mode' not expressed in octal.
WARNING: 'dir_mode' not expressed in octal.
mount error 6 = No such device or address
Refer to the mount.cifs(8) manual page (e.g.man mount.cifs)
also try sudo mount -t smbfs "//192.168.1.100/TangHui的备份" /mnt/win -o username=user,password=123,file_mode=777,dir_mode=777
i did that. but I got :WARNING: 'file_mode' not expressed in octal.
WARNING: 'dir_mode' not expressed in octal.
mount error 6 = No such device or address
Refer to the mount.cifs(8) manual page (e.g.man mount.cifs)
well the first two errors are self explanatory, is the host address correct? can you ping it? does the strange chars in username cause issue
you could aslo try sudo apt-get install smbfs, and do smbmount
smbmount "//host/share" -U user -c 'mount /mnt/win -u 500 -g 100'
try this:
sudo mount -t smbfs -o username=user,password=123 //192.168.1.100/TangHui的备份 /mnt/win
the IP is correct, I can sure. but if is the strange chars cause the problem , i don't know. well, I will try the follow.
if the chars are causing the problem you need to create a credentials file, read up on google its all there
